dtor 0x8C1AE10
-- v0.40.01
-- There ought to be either a type specific reference or a written content one. Not both. -- Story has only been seen with a history event id, not a written content one, but the sample was small. -- Poem has been seen with either a poetic form or a written content reference. -- Music has been seen only with a music form reference, but the sample was small. -- Music has been seen to be "sang" and "spoke" in DF displayed thoughts, but no instrument playing -- or simulation. It's still unknown how to determine what action participants took. -- Dance has been seen only with a dance form reference, but the sample was small.
